scripts.dbrefresh: php artisan migrate:fresh && php artisan migrate --path="database/migrations/*" && php artisan migrate --path="database/migrations/*/*" && php artisan migrate --path="database/migrations/*/*/*" --seed && php artisan passport:client --personal
scripts.dbrefreshfirst: php artisan migrate:fresh && php artisan migrate --path="database/migrations/*" && php artisan migrate --path="database/migrations/*/*" && php artisan migrate --path="database/migrations/*/*/*" --seed && php artisan passport:install && php artisan passport:client --personal

name: report_management
